com.abc

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.abc.Account
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckingAccount, MaxiSavingsAccount, SavingsAccount

    public abstract class Account
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class representing a customers bank account.
    Author:
    Jeff

      • sumTransaction

        public double sumTransaction(Transaction _t,
                    double _amount)
        Sum a transaction with an amount. Provides a consistent method for adding up transactions. Used in all Account operations to calculate the rolling balance.
        Parameters:
        _t - The transaction that will be addeded
        _amount - the amount to add to
        Returns:
        the total Transaction::amount + _amount

        public double getBalance(boolean _refresh)
        Get the current balance on the account.
        Parameters:

      • calculateInterest

        public abstract double calculateInterest()
        Calculate interest on the account. Each subclass is responsible for creating a method of calculating interest.
        Returns:
        the interest on the current balance
